VideoPokerGUI

Class GameBoard

  • Object
    • GameBoard

  • public class GameBoard
extends Object
    Class GameBoard represents the graphical interface of the Video Poker game. The class is able to create all the graphical interface and run an Interactive variant of the Class Game according to a variant of Video Poker previously chosen.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      GameBoard(Variants optionTable)
      Constructor specifying the variant of Video Poker being used (initial balance is set to zero, since it will be set later) and creating a back-end engine of type Interactive.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void initializeGUI()
      Initialize the initial contents of the frame, setting the frame properties and creating the welcome screen.
      void showAdvicePanel()
      Changes the visibility of the MainPanel panel and reveals the AdvicePanel panel with the cards to hold according to the best strategy.

      • Methods inherited from class Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • GameBoard

        public GameBoard(Variants optionTable)
        Constructor specifying the variant of Video Poker being used (initial balance is set to zero, since it will be set later) and creating a back-end engine of type Interactive. This will allow the interface to have objects of type Player, Statistics, Deck and also Variants, according to the parameter passed to the constructor.
        Parameters:
        optionTable - variation of Video Poker used in the game.

    • Method Detail

      • initializeGUI

        public void initializeGUI()
        Initialize the initial contents of the frame, setting the frame properties and creating the welcome screen.

      • showAdvicePanel

        public void showAdvicePanel()
        Changes the visibility of the MainPanel panel and reveals the AdvicePanel panel with the cards to hold according to the best strategy.
